title: InterviewPositionType
description: Provides the information needed to create a Position for an Interview.

positionId.description: This is the Position Identifier assigned by the interviewing system.

positionTemplate.description: The name and Id of a position template.

positionTitle.description: The position title which might be presented to interviewees.

positionPublicTitle.description: The position title that is presented to the interviewee as opposed to the PositionTitle which is used internally by recruiters to reference the position..

positionDescription.description: Position description, which may include html or some type of formatting information.

positionEndDate.description: The end date for the position.

positionCategory.description: A way of grouping positions. E.g, Manager, Admin, Software, Retail, etc.

themeId.description: ID of branding theme this position will use.

accountCode.description: Account Code for use for accounting purposes.

externalId.description: Identifier used by the requesting system to identify the position.

submissionDeadline.description: The default deadline, in hours or date, for an interview requested for this position.

languageCode.description: The default language in which the position is presented to the outside world.

introVideoInId.description: ID of video that welcomes the interviewee to the interview.

introVideoOutId.description: ID of video that thanks interviewee for their participation.

comments.description: Additional information in support of interview position, such as a URL to interviewing system.
